metadata.synopsis: After killing Nightsong the player sees the aftermath in Last Light
metadata.how_to_trigger: Kill Nightsong as part of Shadowheart's OM

0.context: CinematicNodeContext: 'The permiter of torches surrounding the inn flicker and go out, all at once. Shadowy figures start to move in between, descending on the inn'

1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Stunned, lit only by candlelight, she strains to see out the window - then flinches as screams echo inside the inn. She turns to the door as the sound of combat grows closer. She's already reaching for a weapon when the candles go out - and in darkness we hear her door crashing open. Wide shot from the far side of Last Light's bridge: all sources of light flicker and die as the darkness closes in. The screaming goes on.

2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Isobel stands at a window in Last Light, dawning horror as the light of the dome begins to fail. Isobel holds her hand up, straining to maintain the barrier - then staggers as it goes out entirely.

3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Jaheira stands at a window in Last Light, eyes drawn to the perimeter of torches around the inn. With dawning horror, she watches them flicker and go out, all at once. Shadowy figures move in between.
